name: Vertical menu
author: Mostafa Shiraali

sections.description:
Show All Categories in Verticall menu.

This is simple plugin.
If you need a plugin or custom theme, I am at your service through the following communication methods : (non-free)
Telegram : @MostafaShiraali
Discord : MostafaShiraali#7754

Features:

  • Show All Categories With All Sub-Category.
  • You Can Change Direction
  • You Can Select 13 theme
  • Drop&down And Accordion Theme
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin From wordpress admin and Active it.
  2. Go to Setting >> Vertical menu and Set options
  3. Go to widget and Drag&Drop Vertical menu widget in You theme Position.
sections.faq: official Programming web page
sections.changelog:
1.1.3

  • Add Simple Accordion Theme

1.0.3

  • Improve CSS
  • Improve PHP Codes

1.0.0

  • ADD Change Direction Option
  • ADD 12 theme.
